title: Coronofud
author: Coronofud
content: Hi!Ideally I'd like to see a new protocol or overlay that has a talented team working on it. When you post could you cite your source for the claim of them being talented (other projects)

comments.author: dansus021
comments.body: New Altcoin the hype one is aptos but you need to your own research basically altcoin like Layer 2 chain is good usually I comes to coinmarketcap to looking a new project and actually you can filter by category https://coinmarketcap.com/cryptocurrency-category/

comments.author: GreatArkansas
comments.body: For me, I am aiming for projects that are supported by multiple chains, as you can see, there are a lot of networks right now, layer and layer 2, which primarily focused on scaling and alternative Ethereum due to high transaction fees.After that, I also into projects that involved Decentralized Finance (DeFi), especially decentralized exchanges (DEX) where you can do what is normally done on a centralized exchange, like spot trading, futures trading, and options trading.
